title: Pixel 2xl doesn't support esim even beta version it's very sad , finally when will support?
content: Pixel 2xl doesn't support esim even beta version it's very sad and wasted my money 3months salary , no use of these phone, when ever I ride motorcycles I can't auto answer phone call via Bluetooth speaker or Bluetooth headset, nor call not announcement I think I should switch back to iOS only.
